name: Outer Archipelago
role_in_state: peripheral maritime waystation and transshipment chain
culture_adjustments: stronger island dialect of Coastal Tongues; denser oral seaborn proverbs
clan ties oriented to skiff flotillas rather than large coastal households
greater tolerance for informal/pragmatic trade (smuggling tolerated)
shipwright guild rituals more conservative and craft-focused
navigation rites emphasize seabird and current-reading over charts
constraints: limited heavy industrial capacity (no large steam works)
notes: local authority: clan captains + guild masters
